name: Expert Tax - Gothenburg - High Income
description: Foreign specialist earning SEK 800,000 in Gothenburg with Expert Tax regime

sources.description: Expert Tax in Gothenburg (31.50% municipal tax). Only 75% of SEK 800,000 taxable
sources.notes: Gross after 25% exemption: 600,000. Taxable: 600,000 - 17,300 = 582,700. Municipal tax: 582,700 Ã— 31.50% = 183,551. State tax: 0 (below threshold). Work credit: ~47,300. Net tax: ~155,000. Net: ~645,000
